name: Unstable Chem Mystery
description:
Made in under 72 hours for the Ludum Dare Jam

This is a platformer-puzzle where you have to use chemistry to your advantage. Mix together different reagents with unique proporties. But be careful, some combinations are very unstable and dangerous

Controls:

wasd - move

E - use

1,2,3,4,tab,Q - pick slot

left click - drink or throw the current beaker

R - restart

H - return to the main menu

Used this stuff:

Godot 3.3.4

Paint.net

Bfxr

Big thanks to Daniel Linssen for the m5x7 font
